entry.title: Stand Out
entry.summary:
Description

If you can code your way out of a paper bag (or even if you canâ€™t) and want to differentiate yourself in an organization, you can. Come and learn tips that can help you to Stand Out in your organization. These tips can help you successfully lead changes big or small, or simply improve your ability to get people to listen to your suggestions. All of these can help you to Stand Out in your organization.
